definition[0]: the process or business of producing goods in factories
example[0]: Thousands of jobs had been lost in manufacturing.
example[2]: IBM is the world leader in software for manufacturing.
example[3]: The aircraft industry has been one of the few strong spots in US manufacturing.
definition[1]: the part of a company that is concerned with making goods, rather than designing or selling them
example[4]: a former head of manufacturing at Chrysler
